text:
Hi,
 
I have problem recording a windows authenticated web application https://portal.oakton.com.au/ using Jmeter. Can any one please let me know the detailed process (which elements to use and how to record) for acheiving the successful windows authentication using Jmeter. I am using Jmeter 2.5 version. If any related example provided would be appreciated.
 
My test requirement is as follows:
Browse https://portal.oakton.com.au 
Login pop window opens
Enter (domain\username) and password. Click ok button
Home page needs to open
However while I am recording, when the domain username and password details are entered and clicked on ok, the same popup window is displaying.
If any related example provided would be appreciated.
creator: swathi.gajarla@oakton.com.au

text:
